column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////I'd never been here before tonight but it had been recommended by friends many times.  My boyfriend and I went there for dinner and had the apple cider sangria
column3: the short rib and the chicken paella.  Not only was the food fantastic
column4: but the service was out of this world.  Josh A. went above and beyond to make our experience top notch giving opinions on options when we asked.
